archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to change plan at any time, so that I have flexibility I need within Vodafone

properties.value: OOTB, unused data buckets are remained? A nice to have: yes, the unused data bucket should be moved to the new plan for the remaining days. This and the following BUCs apply to subscription model. What about pre-paid and MVNO? There will be separate usecases about MVNOs.
